attributes.action: Close pubs until COVID 19  is gone as they are causing he rate to rise.
attributes.additional_details: No social distancing take place in bars and pubs, no track and track or guidelines are being meet. People can drink at home. Pubs are a breading ground for COVID 19 as the patriots do not care.
attributes.background: Close pub and bars with immediate effect as they are the cause of the infection rate rising. I work in the beauty industry and easing of restrictions can not take place but you can go to a pub....
